overview:
Vikram Mangharam is a chartered accountant (CPA) and a MBA from Thunderbird, AZ and has over 19 years professional experience. He currently manages complex licensing and pricing relationship for Microsoft’s large enterprise customers - a $200M portfolio of about 150 large and mid-size accounts. During his 18+ years of professional life he has worn several hats and has enriched his skills and experience managing various teams and responsibilities and has been exposed to several industries. He regularly presents crisp scenarios to very senior management while getting work done through large teams.

While Finance has been his forte, he understands both mature and emerging businesses & markets, understanding customer’s perception, product strategy and deal structuring. A set of skills make him a well rounded business/finance consultant. I feel there is much value he brings to the table as an orchestrator of successfully brainstorming, planning & execution with client teams.
